動物用藥品名稱: 百肯犬貓皮黴菌症不活化菌苗
英文名稱: BIOCAN M INJ. AD US. VET.
地址: KOMENSKEHO 212, 683 23 IVANOVICE NA HANE, CZECH REPUBLIC
效能(適應症): 預防及治療犬、貓因犬小芽胞菌所引起的皮黴菌症。
ingredients: ACH DOSE(1ML) CONTAINS：INACTIVATED MICROSPORUM CANIS (STRAIN CCM 8211)  ≧5×10^5 VEGETATIVE FORMSALUMINIUM HYDROXIDE 2% SOLUTION  0.1~0.2MLBUFFER SALINE SOLUTION  0.8~0.9ML
